aircraft.value: Vulture Heavy - AC-6727-541 at Base Alpha

defect_observed.value: Exhaust gas temperature margin reduction. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 26/03/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 27/03/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 30/03/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 29/03/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 02/04/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
